comments:
I don't use SET_ENTITY_AUTOMATICALLY option and I have root of persistence hierarchy annotated with @MappedSuperclass. This used to work, but in latest Teneo it breaks in EntityResolvingNameStrategy#toEClass with "No EClass found using ...".

It seems that now I have to add @Entity annotation to root class as well, but my understanding of EJB spec is that additional @Entity should not be necessary.

I am on holiday right now so it will take a few days before I can react on this. 

gr. Martin
*** Bug 197461 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

I tested this but could not replicate the issue. When do you get the exception (are you doing a query?)? Can you post the stacktrace?

gr. Martin

Error happens upon initialization of DataStore, latest CVS. I should also note that Entity (@MappedSuperclass) is in different package than the rest of classes. This is test run with no @Entity annotation:

This is for both dynamic and generated versions of the model. Problem seems to be that EntityResolvingNameStrategy#toEClass looks for entity annotated class  but not for @MappedSuperclass (with no entity):

	for (final PAnnotatedEPackage aPackage : getPaModel().getPaEPackages()) {
			for (final PAnnotatedEClass aClass : aPackage.getPaEClasses()) {
				if (aClass.getEntity() != null && aClass.getEntity().getName() != null &&
